content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: loom
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_slab", "quantity": 23, "index": 10}, {"type": "green_stained_glass", "quantity": 10, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 10, "index": 18}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 18, "index": 23}, {"type": "rose_bush", "quantity": 57, "index": 25}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 34, "index": 40}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 15, "index": 43}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 2, "index": 44}, {"type": "tube_coral", "quantity": 21, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a loom, I need to craft spruce_planks first. Spruce_planks can be crafted from stripped_spruce_wood, which is located in slot 36. Therefore, I will move the stripped_spruce_wood to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: loom
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_slab", "quantity": 23, "index": 10}, {"type": "green_stained_glass", "quantity": 10, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 10, "index": 18}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 18, "index": 23}, {"type": "rose_bush", "quantity": 57, "index": 25}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 34, "index": 40}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 15, "index": 43}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 2, "index": 44}, {"type": "tube_coral", "quantity": 21, "index": 45}]
thought: The stripped_spruce_wood has been moved to slot 1, and therefore I can now craft the spruce_planks. I will move the spruce_planks to slot 11.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: loom

thought: To craft a loom, I need to place 2 strings and 2 spruce_planks in the crafting table. I will first move the string to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1
